title: Sailfish pool
subtitle: Secure and fast memory pool in C
description: lightweight pool manager for small memory allocations in C, optimized for data privacy and speed.

title: Conspire
subtitle: Encrypted, decentralized chat and file sharing
description: Conspire is a free and open-source application for encrypted, decentralized chat and file sharing.

title: DarkFi
subtitle: Free and open-source anonymous P2P ecosystem

title: Darkice
subtitle: live audio streamer for GNU/Linux
description: Darkice records audio from an audio interface, encodes it and sends it to a streaming server.

title: Devuan
subtitle: GNU Linux
description: Operating system distribution based on Debian, without systemd bugs: stable, secure, simple and fast. Less CVEs, more inits to chose: sysvinit, openrc, runit... regular updates since 2016 thanks to steady community driven development.

title: Dynebolic
subtitle: GNU Live CD
description: Dynebolic is a 100% free live OS: no need to install! It is made for media activists, recommended by the GNU project and the Free Software Foundation because it ships without proprietary programs and clean from spyware normally present in other Linux distros.

title: FreeJ
subtitle: Live Video Coding
description: Video mixer for live video manipulation in dance theater, veejaying, medical visualization and TV. Developed in 2001 by Jaromil, used in many performances around the world, historically the first live-coding software on GNU/Linux.

title: Frei0r
subtitle: Video plugins
description: Our free and open source plugin collection for video effects. Many applications use its API to embed more than 100 video filters, sources and mixers, including FFMpeg, KDEnlive, Pure Data and more.

title: Harvest
subtitle: manage large collections of files and dirs

title: HasciiCam
subtitle: ASCII art for the masses
description: HasciiCam makes it possible to have live ASCII art videos on the web.

title: Jaromail
subtitle: Local-first email
description: Jaro Mail is a suite of console email tools to archive mails without storing them online. Built following reliable open source standards.

title: Social Wallet
subtitle: Design and manage currencies in a simple and secure way.

title: sup
subtitle: UNIX privilege escalation
description: Minimal and secure substitute of 'sudo' which can hard-code paths and checksums of binaries to be executed with super-user privileges. Useful for embedded systems that want to avoid complex privilege escalation tools and limit the attack surface.

title: Tomb
subtitle: Linux private folders
description: Tomb is our system to make strong file encryption easy for everyday use. It is a minimalistic command line that facilitates managing secret folders protected by strong encryption. It is based on Linux (LUKS) and guarantees backward compatibility since 2007.

title: Yubiswitch
subtitle: OSX status bar app to quickly enable/disable a Yubikey Nano

title: Zenbridge
subtitle: blockchain multi-layer interop
description: Blockchain interop layer: Zenbridge lets you command and control a swarm of Oracles.

title: Zenroom
subtitle: Secure execution VM
description: Zenroom is our most powerful component for cryptography, fruit of passion and high craftmanship. It is tiny and fully isolated virtual machine that runs on any platform, even on a chip or a web page (WASM). It is programmable in the no-code English-like language Zencode.
